title: Codex Divine: Lore of the Gods
description:
Welcome to the World of Eos, a campaign setting by Tony Hutchins.  In this book, you'll meet the gods and goddesses, their followers, and learn about the  setting's unique mythology.

To use this supplement, you'll need a copy of "The Eos Handbook," available for free from 18intelligence.com.  A copy of the Player's Handbook and Dungeon Master Guide, 3.5 edition, published by Wizards of the Coast, is also suggested.  

Please Seed!  Seeding is the life blood of peer-to-peer file sharing.
